p: A(H3N2) viruses particularly have serious problems such as low replication efficiency in embryonated hen eggs and critical antigenic alterations during egg adaptation. 19, 20 Recently, the US‐FDA approved an influenza vaccine with cell‐derived seed virus. 21 It is thus expected that a completely cell‐based A(H3N2) vaccine will pave the way to overcome the difficulties associated with egg‐based vaccines.
